thread.title: Jose Mourinho stalked by crazed female fan posing as photographer at Manchester United matches
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho stalked by crazed female fan posing as photographer at Manchester United matches

author: oloveridgegreene
title: Jose Mourinho stalked by crazed female fan posing as photographer at Manchester United matches
text:
Comments JOSE Mourinho is being stalked by an Italian woman posing as a photographer at matches. 
Man United ’s security team have been told to stop her from entering Old Trafford and the club’s training HQ. Getty Images Man United boss Jose Mourinho is being stalked by a crazed fan News Group Newspapers Ltd 5 Security staff outside Old Trafford on match day 
Staff at the city hotel where Jose Mourinho is currently living are also thought to have been warned about the blonde fan. 
A source said: “The issue dates back to his time at Chelsea and possibly longer. 
“She’s very persistent and appears to have the hots for him. Alamy Man United’s security team are on red alert and have been told to ban her from Old Trafford RELATED STORIES Luke Shaw's agent angrily denies reports Jose Mourinho wants to sell the England international No one's special Jose Mourinho says free-scoring days of Man United domination are over... despite them returning to top of world football's rich list JOSE BORE-INHO Mourinho warns era of Man United playing attacking football is over as Pogba says: not my job to score Doesn't ad up Jose Mourinho will slash Adnan Januzaj’s asking price in half to just £8m in bid to flog flop this summer SILVA BULLET Manchester United line up Monaco star Bernardo Silva but could be forced to pay £70million for playmaker 'Target is Top Three' Nemanja Vidic insists Man Utd are OUT of the title race after drawing against Liverpool 
United staff became aware of it a few months ago and information has been circulated within the club to security staff. 
“She works in the media and has previously been granted accreditation for matches. 
“She always seems very keen to speak to Jose, to the point where it’s a bit odd.” 
The Portuguese manager, 53, has been living at Manchester’s Lowry Hotel since taking over at Old Trafford last May. Google Maps Streetview Staff at Manchester’s Lowry hotel – where Jose Mourinho is currently staying – have also been told to look out for the stalker PA:Press Association 5 Staff at the club said the woman was always keen to talk to Jose ‘to the point where it’s a bit odd’ 
The Sun on Sunday told how he made two 2,000-mile round trips to his homeland over Christmas after wife Matilde, 51, needed emergency medical treatment. 
Former Man United star Rio Ferdinand was also plagued by a female fan at Old Trafford, with ex-model Susanne Ibru, 43, jailed for 18 weeks in 2012. 
Manchester United also this week became the first club to appoint a counter-terror expert in an effort to beef up security around the 75,635-seater stadium. Jose Mourinho answers a journalist's phone during press conference
